scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection of Palmer Cox includes twenty-six pen and ink drawings for "The Brownies: Their Book,", 1887; eleven pen and ink drawings of the Brownies, ca. 1890, mounted in an album; and an album of eleven Brownie decals, n.d.

A collection of 26 original pen and ink drawings by Palmer Cox, author-artist of the "Brownie" book, for the first of this popular series of juveniles to appear in book form. It was published by The Century Company in 1887.

A group of 11 original pen and ink drawings by Palmer Cox for his "Brownie" books, mounted in a blue album. Signed pencil sketch showing the fairy queen and her subjects is mounted on the side front cover.
A group of 11 colored decals illustrating Palmer Cox's "Brownie."
